thread.title: BRIEF-Sun Hydraulics Has Commenced Underwritten Public Offering Of 4 Mln Shares Of Common Stock​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sun Hydraulics Has Commenced Underwritten Public Offering Of 4 Mln Shares Of Common Stock​
text:
Jan 29 (Reuters) - Sun Hydraulics Corp:
* SUN HYDRAULICS ANNOUNCES PUBLIC OFFERING OF COMMON STOCK * SUN HYDRAULICS CORP - ‍HAS COMMENCED AN UNDERWRITTEN PUBLIC OFFERING OF 4 MILLION SHARES OF COMMON STOCK​
* SUN HYDRAULICS CORP - ‍INTENDS TO USE ALL OF NET PROCEEDS OF OFFERING FOR REPAYMENT OF DEBT UNDER CREDIT FACILITY, TO FUND ACQUISITION ACTIVITY​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
